column1: #text=I had spent the day planting a tree and needed to take a bath to clean myself and relax those tired muscles .
#text=I went to the bathroom and turned on the faucet in the bathtub .
#text=Once the water reached the temperature that I wanted I plugged the drain to fill the bathtub .
#text=While the tub was filling up I undressed myself and put the dirty soiled clothing in the the hamper .
#text=I turned the water off and got into the nice hot relaxing tub of water .
#text=I added some bath soap into the tub and proceeded to scrub the dirt off my body with a washcloth .
#text=After washing myself and relaxing a bit I unclog the drain and watch the dirty soapy water spiral down the drain .
#text=I rinse body quickly in the shower to rinse the soap off .
#text=I get out and grab a towel to dry myself .
#text=I put on a clean set of clothes and feel fresh .
